PerfectNetExp.abs: people are meant to be brothers , away from distinctions , aiming to contribute happily to a society of friendship and love ( jus commune gentium ) .所有的人都被视为兄弟，情同手足，旨在为一个友爱的社会贡献幸福（绝对公社万民法）。
